string-array.name: tts_demo_strings
string-array.item: This is an example of speech synthesis in English.
Voici un échantillon de synthèse vocale en français.
Dies ist ein Beispiel für Sprachsynthese in Deutsch.
Questo è un esempio di sintesi vocale in italiano.
Este es un ejemplo de síntesis de voz en español.

Back button on the left, Overview button on the right

string-array.name: msd_pc_system_install_finish_summary
string-array.item: USB mass storage will open automatically when connected to a computer.

string-array.name: msd_pc_system_retry_linux
string-array.item: Install tool: sudo aptitude install mtpfs libfuse-dev libmad0-dev
Confirm user group permissions in the current fuse user group
Access mounted device: mtpfs /media/mtp via file explorer; same as local directory
"Uninstall device: fusermount -u /media/mtp Note: Only for Ubuntu 8.04!"

string-array.name: network_speed_slow_summary
string-array.item: Network is slow due to too much traffic
Network is slow due to weak signal strength

string-array.item: Reboot your device to apply this setting?
